name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior AI Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **Python**, **MachineLearning**, and proficient in frameworks such as **TensorFlow**, **PyTorch**, and **HuggingFace**. Expertise in data manipulation and analysis using **Pandas** and building models that leverage **LLM**, **LangChain**, and **ONNX** for efficient AI solutions. Skilled in applying AI ethics and ensuring data privacy throughout the development process. 
Demonstrated ability in delivering high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial industries, with a strong focus on predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing. Proven experience in compliance-driven development, aligning with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. 
Adept in Agile methodologies, showcasing exceptional problem-solving and communication skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

Conducted thorough analyses of model performance, leveraging metrics to iterate and improve AI functionalities continuously.
Created technical documentation and presented findings to stakeholders, demonstrating technical and business acumen in **Machine Learning** innovations.
Mentored junior engineers, promoting knowledge sharing and fostering an innovative environment that encourages effective solutions to complex problems.

Leveraged **Python** and advanced libraries such as **Pandas**, **TensorFlow**, and **PyTorch** to develop and optimize AI-driven features, enhancing overall platform functionality and performance by **30%**.
Engineered and integrated machine learning models with frameworks like **HuggingFace** and **LangChain** to provide real-time insights and recommendations, improving user engagement metrics by **25%**.

Designed and prototyped AI/ML algorithms that assess data inputs for quality and relevance, resulting in enhanced decision-making processes across the organization.
